name: Under the Sea (itch) (Cælus Golf)
description:
Under the Sea is a small toy that lets you control a small drone that ressembles a ray.

You can control the drone by powering the different reactors. There's four reactors on each cardinal direction of the drone, allowing you to rotate it, and there's one big reactor on the center that allows the drone to elevate.

Try using the big reactor in conjunction with one of the small ones to move the drone around!

Explore around the map and pick up the trash that fills the underwater world to clean the place!

Controls :
Z Q S D to power the cardinal reactors
Space to power the center reactor
Shift to reset the drone rotation
Use the mouse to navigate the menus and to move the camera

Under the Sea is a school project made by a group of game design students during their second year at ICAN Paris.
The game was made by Dorian Chedal, Lucas Flego (Cælus Golf), Ethan Karoutché and Guillaume Russo (Volothamp).
